page.title: 15Farming
page.content: {Farming}in our area is mainly {arable but there are some{dairy}farms. Howletts Hall farm is rented from Wadham college.It is situated 2Km along the Chelmsford Rd and it covers 292 acres.Clay taken from a pit in front of the house was used to build the{farm}buildings.This pit is now a fishing pond for{recreational}purposes .Oilseed rape,winter wheat and winter barley are grown on the farm.The woodland is used for{coppicing}and breeding{pheasants}for shooting. Farming today has become{mechanised .On Howletts Hall farm there are six tractors,one combine,a J.C.B.,two ploughs,a seed drill and many others. As well as farming his own land the farmer is a{contractor}.A{computer}is used for the bussiness acounts on the farm.The farmer keeps in contact with the farm office with a C.B. radio.
